title: Eiza Gonzalez looks unrecognizable as she dresses up as Maleficent for Casamigos Halloween party
text:
Maleficent: Mistress of Evil topped the box office in its opening weekend last week.

And one fan of the Angelina Jolie spectacular was Eiza Gonzalez, dressing up as the Disney character for the Casamigos Halloween party on Friday night.

The 29-year-old actress was spotted in Beverly Hills stepping into the star-studded extravaganza for the annual event.

Scroll down for video

Eiza Gonzalez looked unrecognizable on Friday night when she dressed up as Angelina Jolie's character in Maleficent for the annual Casamigos Halloween party in Beverly Hills

Eiza showcased her trim physique underneath a form-fitting dress that was cinched in at the waist.

Her full-length frock drew attention to her ample cleavage and was complete with a choker around her neck.

The Mexican actress completed her look with pointed-toe boots and the Maleficent headpiece on her scalp.

Gorgeous: Eiza showcased her trim physique underneath a form-fitting dress that was cinched in at the waist

Spitting image: The Hobbs & Shaw star rocked a porcelain complexion with a bold brush of a darker contour below her cheekbones and a red lip

Eiza's hair was kept underneath her bold accessory and her glam the spitting image of Angelina Jolie.

The Hobbs & Shaw star rocked a porcelain complexion with a bold brush of a darker contour below her cheekbones and a red lip.

And perhaps her costume inspiration came from a mix between Angelina and actress Blanca Blanco, who recently stripped down for a sexy and barely clothed Maleficent shoot.

‹ Slide me › Who wore it better? And perhaps her costume inspiration came from a mix between Angelina and actress Blanca Blanco, who recently stripped down for a sexy and barely clothed Maleficent shoot

Not the best results: Despite topping the box office last weekend, Maleficent bombed in North America, earning just $36 million compared to $69 million for the first installment

Despite topping the box office last weekend, Maleficent bombed in North America, earning just $36 million compared to $69 million for the first installment.

However, overseas the Walt Disney film did much better on $117 million - totaling a worldwide $153 million debut.

Forbes stated on Sunday that the low numbers were due to the 'five years later curse.'

The first Maleficent came out in 2014 before the second last week.
description: Eiza Gonzalez looked unrecognizable on Friday night when she dressed up as Angelina Jolie's character in Maleficent for the annual Casamigos Halloween party in Beverly Hills.
